pr_title: Add FAT for concurrent JPA class transformation for PH26967

timeline.message:

Add FAT for concurrent JPA class transformation for PH26967

timeline.bodyText: Any reason you use io.openliberty for package prefix in the other source directories, but in this one you use com.ibm.ws?
timeline.author: jhanders34
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Because the test tooling is a "common set" of tools between all my fats (wish we could have a library project that fats could use, but I understand that is discouraged?) which I copied from one of the other projects.
replies.author: jgrassel
